The Venus Host Offers Month-to-Month Shared Hosting for Only $2.44/Month!

cheap hosting, cheap shared hosting, shared hosting, the venus host, thevenushost May 18, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

The Venus Host is bringing us another great offer for cheap Linux/Windows/Wordpress hosting.

  • For only $2.44 per month, get 10GB of shared hosting space with unlimited bandwidth and free DDoS protection!

As we’ve mentioned before, The Venus Host believes in earning your business every month.  No annual contracts or 3-year pre-pays here.  You’re only committed for a month and they’re sure you’ll love the service.

They are registered in India (GST 27BSJPK2416A1Z6). Their Terms of Service is available on their web site (Privacy Policy). They accept international paymets through PayPal and local payments through local payment gateway CCavenue and Razorpay.

Here’s a little about The Venus Host in their own words:

We are THE VENUS HOST India based Website Hosting And Domain Registration Service Provider.
We provide Professional website hosting services across Linux, Windows and WordPress Hosting platforms.
We also provide Wide range of domains at very cheap price.

We provide Free SSL certificates & CDN to all the the web sites hosted on our servers.

We are using 100% SSD Disks and Our servers are highly configured and can handle DDoS attack upto 1TBPS.

We provide separate disk space for the emails as per the plans you will get the additional Email disk space.

We use customized control panel which is configured with the inbuilt apps like File Permission checker, Malware Scanner, Website Builder ETC,

We provide more than 70 one click installs so you will get the wide range of the apps to install on your website.
